scripts.build-fe: cd ./game-frontend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.build-be: cd ./game-backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.start-fe: cd ./game-frontend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start
scripts.start-be: cd ./game-backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start
scripts.test-fe: cd ./game-frontend && cross-env NODE_ENV=test CI=true npm run test
scripts.test-be: cd ./game-backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=test CI=true npm run test
scripts.install-app: npm install && npm run install-be && npm run install-fe
scripts.build: npm run build-be && npm run build-fe
scripts.test: npm run test-be && npm run test-fe
